definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: The conclusion of the research gives a decision reference on development of Shanxi defence industry.
sentences.chinese: 本文的結論對陝西國防工業發展有重要決策參考價值。

sentences.english: The defence industry should take cover.
sentences.chinese: 國防工業應該給自己找後路了。

sentences.english: The technology and defense industries are the most vulnerable, Lewis says.
sentences.chinese: 科技和國防工業是最易受攻擊的，劉易斯說。

sentences.english: This type of industrial espionage is prevalent in the defense-related industries.
sentences.chinese: 這種類型的工業間諜活動在國防工業內十分普遍。
